title: Most popular crisps and savoury snack brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Snack Brand in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
There is a difference of 20.0 between the maximum Snack Brand Walkers and minimum Snack Brand KP nuts.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Snack Brand in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Snack Brand in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
There is a difference of 20.0 between the maximum Snack Brand Walkers and minimum Snack Brand KP nuts.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing of Snack Brand Walkers is 1.91% larger than the minimum value at KP nuts.
Snack Brand Walkers is higher than any other Snack Brands with value 42.0, followed by , and Pringles. Down to Snack Brand KP nuts with the lowest value 22.0.
Snack Brand Hula Hoops, and Pringles share the same value 26.0.
The Snack Brand KP nuts tends to be 1.49 percent lower than average.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is 197.0 if we add up values of all Snack Brands.
